#summary List of all mods available.

Many of these have still version 1.0, because they were never released to the public before.
|| *Name* || *Version* || *Description* ||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/action-shop.xml action-shop] || 1.0 || _Buy items by using other item._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/adori-blank.xml adori-blank] || 1.0 || _New spell used for conjuring blank runes._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/adori-sum.xml adori-sum] || 1.0 || _New spell used for merging runes._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/advance-effect.xml advance-effect] || 1.0 || _Display magic effect when player advance._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/advance-reward.xml advance-reward] || 1.0 || _Highly configurable rewards system executed on advance to the specific level (level, magic or skill)._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/animated-smiles.xml animated-smiles] || 1.0 || _Change character smiles into animated ones._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/annihilator.xml annihilator] || 1.0 || _Highly configurable annihilator quest, with support for many switches._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/anti-trap.xml anti-trap] || 1.3 || _New command *!noob* which will prevent blocking by noobs._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ballista.xml ballista] || 1.0 || _Showing a nice realistic effect when using ballista._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bless-system.xml bless-system] || 1.0 || _Buy blessings by using a command or an item._||

|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-buy.xml command-buy] || 1.0 || _New command *!buy* - buying items with gold coins._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-exp.xml command-exp] || 1.0 || _New command *!exp* displaying experience needed to advance._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-ip.xml command-ip] || 1.0 || _New command *!ip* displaying player ip._||

|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-mana.xml command-mana] || 1.0 || _New command *!mana* showing how much mana need to be spent for the advance to the next magic level._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-marry.xml command-marry] || 1.0 || _New command: *!marry* - marry other player using command._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-monsterinfo.xml command-monsterinfo] || 1.0 || _New command: *!m* to show some info about specific monster (i.e. experience, attacks, summons, loot)._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-points.xml command-points] || 1.0 || _Change name, sex, remove skull/stamina for premium points._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-promotion.xml command-promotion] || 1.0 || _New command *!promotion* for buying promotion (supports custom vocations)._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-refill.xml command-refill] || 1.0 || _New command *!refill* for refilling your worn soft boots or firewalker boots (or any other item - configurable)._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/command-save.xml command-save] || 1.0 || _New command *!save* for self saving._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/experience-rune.xml experience-rune] || 1.0 || _Gives player experience when used. Configurable limit & amount._||
|| [http://tfs-mods.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/guild-cast.xml guild-cast] || 1.0 || _New command *!gc* for broadcasting guild messages._||
